para.text: The model has a single transient stress periods with a duration of 365 days and 1 time step. Specify that in the "Model|MODFLOW Time" dialog box.

image.title: Screen capture of the MODFLOW Time dialog box illustrating the specification of a single transient stress period.
image.caption: Screen capture of the MODFLOW Time dialog box illustrating the specification of a single transient stress period.

para.text: Because the storage package is required for transient models, it will be activated when you close the dialog box.
